segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen scene unfolding right in front of me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman at the sink, carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on that dish, not even glancing around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring out of the faucet and overflowing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A big puddle is forming at her feet, and she's standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's wet, but she doesn't seem to notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, two kids are up to something sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on a wobbly stool, reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing there with her hand out, waiting for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden looks so peaceful and nice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's funny how calm everything seems outside compared to this chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
